title: "Jordan- King congratulates Robotna Girls team on winning international robotics prize"
excerpt: "The Robotna Girls team was assembled by the start-up Robotna, which was established in 2017 to train young students on utilising modern technology such as robotics and AI. Every year, Robotna selects 10 female students from public schools after testing and assessing them, to receive intensive training and participate in various competitions."
